languages.text: {n}Янрис учтиво указывает на груду реликвий, трофеев и обитых золотом сундуков.{/n} "Следуя вашему поручению, мы успели эвакуировать часть ваших богатств и освященных оружейных масел и амуниции из поврежденных отсеков. Извольте воспользоваться тем, что сочтете нужным. Смею заверить, что остальное пребудет со мной в полной сохранности".

{n}Janris points courteously to a pile of relics, trophies, and chests overlaid with gold.{/n} "Following your instructions, we were able to evacuate some of your riches in time, as well as the sacred unguents and ammunition from the damaged compartments. Use whatever you like as you see fit. I can assure you that the rest will remain with me in perfect safety."
languages.original_text: {n}Янрис учтиво указывает на груду реликвий, трофеев и обитых золотом сундуков.{/n} "Следуя вашему поручению, мы успели эвакуировать часть ваших богатств и освященных оружейных масел и амуниции из поврежденных отсеков. Извольте воспользоваться тем, что сочтете нужным. Смею заверить, что остальное пребудет со мной в полной сохранности".

traits.locale_text: {n}Janris courteously points to a pile of relics, trophies, and chests upholstered in gold.{/n} "Following your instructions, we have had sufficient time to evacuate some of your riches, as well as sacred unguents and ammunition from the damaged compartments. May you use what you see fit. I can assure you that the rest will remain with me in perfect safety."

Use whatever you like as you see fit. I can assure you that the rest will remain with me in perfect safety."

Use whatever you like as you see fit. I can assure you that the rest will remain with me in perfect safety."

{n}Janris points courteously to a pile of relics, trophies, and chests overlaid with gold.{/n} "Following your instructions, we were able to evacuate some of your riches in time, as well as the sacred unguents and ammunition from the damaged compartments. Use whatever you like as you see fit. I can assure you that the rest will remain with me in perfect safety."

languages.text: {n}Janris señala educadamente a una pila de reliquias, trofeos y cofres cubiertos de oro.{/n} «Bajo sus instrucciones, logramos evacuar parte de su riqueza a tiempo, así como los ungüentos sagrados y la munición de los compartimentos dañados. Utilice lo que considere oportuno como crea mejor. Le aseguro que el resto estará perfectamente a salvo aquí, conmigo».
languages.original_text: {n}Janris points courteously to a pile of relics, trophies, and chests overlaid with gold.{/n} "Following your instructions, we were able to evacuate some of your riches in time, as well as the sacred unguents and ammunition from the damaged compartments. Use whatever you like as you see fit. I can assure you that the rest will remain with me in perfect safety."

traits.locale_text: {n}Janris señala educadamente a una pila de reliquias, trofeos y cofres cubiertos de oro.{/n} «Bajo sus instrucciones, logramos evacuar parte de su riqueza a tiempo, así como los ungüentos sagrados y la munición de los compartimentos dañados. Utilice lo que considere oportuno como crea mejor. Le aseguro que el resto estará perfectamente a salvo aquí, conmigo».

languages.text: {n}ジャンリスは、遺品や戦利品、金で覆われた宝箱の山を丁寧に指さす。{/n}「あなたの指示に従い、あなたの財産の一部を時間内に避難させることができました。被害を受けた区画から、聖なる軟膏や弾薬も持ち出しましたよ。お好きなものをお好きなようにお使いください。残りは私のもとで安全に保管します」
languages.original_text: {n}Janris points courteously to a pile of relics, trophies, and chests overlaid with gold.{/n} "Following your instructions, we were able to evacuate some of your riches in time, as well as the sacred unguents and ammunition from the damaged compartments. Use whatever you like as you see fit. I can assure you that the rest will remain with me in perfect safety."

traits.locale_text: {n}ジャンリスは、遺品や戦利品、金で覆われた宝箱の山を丁寧に指さす。{/n}「あなたの指示に従い、あなたの財産の一部を時間内に避難させることができました。被害を受けた区画から、聖なる軟膏や弾薬も持ち出しましたよ。お好きなものをお好きなようにお使いください。残りは私のもとで安全に保管します」

languages.text: {n}詹里斯彬彬有礼地指着几口镶满黄金的箱子，箱子里装满了圣物与战利品。{/n}“按照您的指示，我们及时从受损的船舱里取回了一部分您的财产。除此之外，我们还找到了神圣的药膏与弹药，这些补给品您可以任意使用。我可以向您保证，我会守好其余的财物，不会有任何闪失。”
languages.original_text: {n}Janris points courteously to a pile of relics, trophies, and chests overlaid with gold.{/n} "Following your instructions, we were able to evacuate some of your riches in time, as well as the sacred unguents and ammunition from the damaged compartments. Use whatever you like as you see fit. I can assure you that the rest will remain with me in perfect safety."

traits.locale_text: {n}詹里斯彬彬有礼地指着几口镶满黄金的箱子，箱子里装满了圣物与战利品。{/n}“按照您的指示，我们及时从受损的船舱里取回了一部分您的财产。除此之外，我们还找到了神圣的药膏与弹药，这些补给品您可以任意使用。我可以向您保证，我会守好其余的财物，不会有任何闪失。”

languages.text: {n}Janris deutet höflich auf einen Stapel von Relikten, Trophäen und vergoldeten Truhen.{/n} "Wir konnten wie von Euch geheißen einige Eurer Reichtümer rechtzeitig aus den beschädigten Modulen retten, ebenso wie die heiligen Öle und sowie Munition. Nutzt, was Ihr benötigt. Ich kann Euch versichern, dass der Rest bei mir vollkommen gut aufgehoben ist."
languages.original_text: {n}Janris points courteously to a pile of relics, trophies, and chests overlaid with gold.{/n} "Following your instructions, we were able to evacuate some of your riches in time, as well as the sacred unguents and ammunition from the damaged compartments. Use whatever you like as you see fit. I can assure you that the rest will remain with me in perfect safety."

traits.locale_text: {n}Janris deutet höflich auf einen Stapel von Relikten, Trophäen und vergoldeten Truhen.{/n} "Wir konnten wie von Euch geheißen einige Eurer Reichtümer rechtzeitig aus den beschädigten Modulen retten, ebenso wie die heiligen Öle und sowie Munition. Nutzt, was Ihr benötigt. Ich kann Euch versichern, dass der Rest bei mir vollkommen gut aufgehoben ist."

languages.text: {n}Janris désigne avec courtoisie une pile de reliques, trophées et coffres recouverts d'or.{/n} « Conformément à vos instructions, nous avons pu évacuer certaines de vos richesses des compartiments endommagés, dont des onguents sacrés et un certain nombre de munitions. Libre à vous de les utiliser comme bon vous semble. Je m'assurerai personnellement que le reste demeure en parfaite sécurité. »
languages.original_text: {n}Janris points courteously to a pile of relics, trophies, and chests overlaid with gold.{/n} "Following your instructions, we were able to evacuate some of your riches in time, as well as the sacred unguents and ammunition from the damaged compartments. Use whatever you like as you see fit. I can assure you that the rest will remain with me in perfect safety."

traits.locale_text: {n}Janris désigne avec courtoisie une pile de reliques, trophées et coffres recouverts d'or.{/n} « Conformément à vos instructions, nous avons pu évacuer certaines de vos richesses des compartiments endommagés, dont des onguents sacrés et un certain nombre de munitions. Libre à vous de les utiliser comme bon vous semble. Je m'assurerai personnellement que le reste demeure en parfaite sécurité. »

languages.text: {n}Janris; yadigârlardan, ganimetlerden ve altın dolu sandıklardan oluşan yığına kibarca işaret ediyor.{/n} "Yönergelerinizi takip ederek hasar görmüş kompartımanlardan hazinelerinizin, kutsal özyağların ve mühimmatın bir kısmını vaktinde kurtarmayı başardık. Dilediğinizi gönlünüzce kullanabilirsiniz. Kalanların benim himayemde güvende olacağından emin olabilirsiniz."
languages.original_text: {n}Janris points courteously to a pile of relics, trophies, and chests overlaid with gold.{/n} "Following your instructions, we were able to evacuate some of your riches in time, as well as the sacred unguents and ammunition from the damaged compartments. Use whatever you like as you see fit. I can assure you that the rest will remain with me in perfect safety."
